snippet: In the last decade, the Giants have repeatedly faced backup quarterbacks and lost, from Philadelphia’s Nick Foles last month to Cincinnati’s Jon Kitna in 2004.
abstract: New York Giants are trying to avoid false confidence as they prepare for game against Green Bay Packers and rookie quarterback Scott Tolzien, who has been called up from practice squad; Giants have a history of losing to backup quarterbacks.
lead_paragraph: In the last decade, the Giants have repeatedly faced backup quarterbacks and lost, from Philadelphia’s Nick Foles last month to Cincinnati’s Jon Kitna in 2004.

headline.main: Giants, With a History of Losing to Backups, Are Wary of Tolzien
headline.print_headline: Giants, With a History of Losing to Backups, Are Wary of Tolzien
